title: Mental Health Then and Now.
summary: Mental illness is commonly experienced throughout the world. The understanding of and treatment for mental health has changed throughout centuries. Mental health is more openly discussed now, but stigma about mental illness remains....
abstract: Mental illness is commonly experienced throughout the world. The understanding of and treatment for mental health has changed throughout centuries. Mental health is more openly discussed now, but stigma about mental illness remains.
